generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a centerline, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A paved area on the right side of the road, separated by a curb, where pedestrians and a child with a bicycle are standing.
- building: A multi-story residential building is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A woman and a child are standing on the sidewalk near a traffic light.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, showing a yellow light.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (P) and a directional sign are visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- bicycle: A child is standing next to a bicycle on the sidewalk.
- car: A car is visible in the distance on the road.
